49//*****************************************************************************
50#include <stdint.h>
51#include <stdbool.h>
52
53#ifndef AM_BOOTLOADER_H
54#define AM_BOOTLOADER_H
55
56//*****************************************************************************
57//
58// Macros
59//
60//*****************************************************************************
61#define AM_BOOTLOADER_DISABLE_OVERRIDE_PIN (0xFFFFFFFF)
62#define AM_BOOTLOADER_OVERRIDE_HIGH (0x1)
63#define AM_BOOTLOADER_OVERRIDE_LOW (0x0)
64
65#ifdef __cplusplus
66extern "C"
67{
68#endif
69
70//*****************************************************************************
71//
72// Structure to keep track of boot image information.
73// In the flash, the structure contains a 4 byte CRC for integrity
74// verification. It needs to be ensured that the size of this structure is
75// not more than AM_HAL_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE bytes
76//
77//*****************************************************************************
78typedef struct
79{
80 // Starting address where the image was linked to run.
81 uint32_t *pui32LinkAddress;
82
83 // Length of the executable image in bytes.
84 uint32_t ui32NumBytes;
85
86 // CRC-32 Value for the full image.
87 uint32_t ui32CRC;
88
89 // Override GPIO number. (Can be used to force a new image load)
90 uint32_t ui32OverrideGPIO;
91
92 // Polarity for the override pin.
93 uint32_t ui32OverridePolarity;
94
95 // Stack pointer location.
96 uint32_t *pui32StackPointer;
97
98 // Reset vector location.
99 uint32_t *pui32ResetVector;
100
101 // Protection status of image in flash
102 uint32_t bEncrypted;
103
104 // CRC-32 value of this structure
105 uint32_t ui32Checksum;
106}
107am_util_bootloader_image_t;
108
109//*****************************************************************************
110//
111// External function declarations.
112//
113//*****************************************************************************
114extern uint32_t am_util_bootloader_crc32(const void *pvData, uint32_t ui32Length);
115extern uint32_t am_util_bootloader_fast_crc32(const void *pvData, uint32_t ui32NumBytes);
116extern void am_util_bootloader_partial_crc32(const void *pvData, uint32_t ui32NumBytes, uint32_t *pui32CRC);
117extern bool am_util_bootloader_image_check(am_util_bootloader_image_t *psImage);
118extern bool am_util_bootloader_flash_check(am_util_bootloader_image_t *psImage);
119extern int am_util_bootloader_flag_page_update(am_util_bootloader_image_t *psImage, uint32_t *pui32FlagPage);
120extern bool am_util_bootloader_validate_structure(uint32_t *pInfo, uint32_t size);
121extern bool am_hal_bootloader_override_check(am_util_bootloader_image_t *psImage);
122extern void am_util_bootloader_image_run(am_util_bootloader_image_t *psImage);
123extern bool am_util_bootloader_check_index(uint32_t index, uint32_t *pMask);
124extern void am_util_bootloader_write_flash_within_page(uint32_t ui32WriteAddr,
125 uint32_t *pui32ReadAddr, uint32_t ui32NumWords);
126
127extern void am_util_bootloader_program_flash_page(uint32_t ui32WriteAddr,
128 uint32_t *pui32ReadAddr, uint32_t numBytes);
129extern void am_util_bootloader_erase_flash_page(uint32_t ui32Addr);
130
131#ifdef __cplusplus
132}
133#endif
134
135#endif // AM_BOOTLOADER_H
